in.co.rays.proj0.service

Class CourseServiceSpringImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.proj0.service.CourseServiceSpringImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CourseServiceInt

    @Service(value="courseService")
public class CourseServiceSpringImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CourseServiceInt
    Session facade of Course Service. It is transactional, apply delcarative transactions with help of Spring AOP. If unchecked exception is propagated from a method then transaction will be rolled back. Default propogation value is Propagation.REQUIRED and readOnly = false
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    DAO
